Koreans in Germany Hold Meeting for Peace against War
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Great Services Praised 
    Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- K. David Mafabi, director of the Political Department of the Pan-African Movement, issued a statement on July 6 on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
 Recalling that Kim Il Sung made a great contribution to the independence and the building of a new society in Africa and built true socialism centering on the popular masses in Korea, he in the statement said the world people, especially the African people would always remember the President.    
 Noting that under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il the Korean people have made great successes despite foreign forces' plots to isolate and stifle the DPRK, he expressed firm conviction that Korea would surely emerge victorious in the future, too, under his guidance.
